long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Futurwise are building a next-gen media platform that turns the best non-AI content into hyper-personalized daily insights in many formats and languages. 

We're building the platform in steps and the first piece of the puzzle are hyper-personalized summaries. Drop in a URL of an article to generate your own summary that you can personalize by tone of voice, writing style, level of experience and language.

Use this extension in along with our app to get started with a 7-day free trial. Download the app at https://www.futurwise.com/download/.
